2.EN: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
2.CN: 爱是耐心的，爱是仁慈的。它不嫉妒，不夸耀，不自傲。

3.EN: The only thing we never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
3.CN: 我们永远得不到的唯一东西是爱；我们永远给予不够的也是爱。

4.EN: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
4.CN: 爱使你的灵魂从藏身之处爬出。

5.EN: Nobody has ever measured, even poets, how much a heart can hold.
5.CN: 没有人，连诗人也不例外，能测量一颗心能承载多少。

6.EN: I am grateful that you were born, that your love is mine, and our two lives are woven and welded together.
6.CN: 我感激你的出生，你的爱是我的，我们的两条生命交织在一起。

7.EN: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.
7.CN: 要有足够的勇气再次相信爱，总是再一次。

8.EN: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
8.CN: 许多人想与你同乘豪车，但你真正需要的是豪车抛锚时愿意与你一起乘坐公交车的人。

9.EN: True love stories never have endings.
9.CN: 真正的爱情故事永远没有结局。

10.EN: She knew she loved him when 'home' went from being a place to being a person.
10.CN: 当“家”从一个地方变成一个人时，她知道她爱上了他。

11.CN: 为何好女孩总喜欢坏男孩？
11.EN: Why do the good girls, always want the bad boys?

12.EN: It is never too late to fall in love.

13.CN: 对于世界，你可能只是一个人，但对于某个人，你却是整个世界。
13.EN: To the world you may be just one person. To the person you may be the world.

14.CN: 哪里有爱，哪里就有希望。
14.EN: Where there is love, there are always wishes.

15.CN: 你不会因为美丽去爱一个女人，但她却会因为你的爱而变得美丽。
15.EN: You don't love a woman because she is beautiful, but she is beautiful because you love her.

16.CN: 爱是永恒的，外表可能改变，但本质永远不变。
16.EN: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.

17.CN: 我会想你，在漫漫长路的每一步。
17.EN: I'll think of you every step of the way.

18.CN: 无论你身在何处，无论你为何忙碌，我都会在此守候。
18.EN: Wherever you go, whatever you do, I will be right here waiting for you.

19.CN: 热烈的爱情是不可抑制的渴望。
19.EN: Passionate love is a quenchless thirst.

20.CN: 爱情不是数着日子过去，它让每个日子都变得有意义。
20.EN: Love is not a matter of counting the days. It's making the days count.

21.CN: 爱是一盏永不昏暗的明灯。
21.EN: Love is a lamp that never dims.

22.EN: Everyone should love at least once in their life.

23.EN: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.

24.CN: 两颗相爱的心之间不需要言语。
24.EN: No words are necessary between two loving hearts.

25.CN: 在这世上珍贵的东西总是罕有，所以这世上只有一个你。
25.EN: Precious things are very few in this world. That is the reason there is just one you.

27.CN: 通往爱人家里的路总不会漫长。
27.EN: The road to a lover's house is never long.

28.CN: 和你在一起就像在一个清爽的早晨漫步。
28.EN: Being with you is like walking on a very clear morning.

29.EN: It is never too late to fall in love.

30.CN: 爱是永恒的，外表可能改变，但本质永远不变。
30.EN: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.

31.CN: 我会想你，在漫漫长路的每一步。
31.EN: I'll think of you every step of the way.

32.CN: 因为有花谢的那一天，就去阻止花开吗？
32.EN: Is it worthwhile to prevent the flower from blooming, just because there will be a day when it withers?

33.CN: 既然结局注定，那就让过程本身具有意义。
33.EN: Since the ending is already set, let the process itself be meaningful.

34.CN: 一身清贫怎敢入繁华，两袖清风怎敢误佳人。
34.EN: How come someone with nothing dare to step into the flamboyant world, and how can someone empty-handed dare to let down a beautiful woman like you?

35.CN: 好消息：中奖了；坏消息：过期了。
35.EN: Good news: you won the lottery; bad news: it's expired.

36.CN: 你穿婚纱的样子真好看，我都有点恍惚了，让我觉得喜欢你好像是上辈子的事，但是当你开口，我却一瞬间回到了十七岁的那个时候。-《你的婚礼》
36.EN: You in a wedding dress, a sight so divine, it's got me in a daze, feeling like you're mine! It feels like a memory from a lifetime ago, but when you talk, back to seventeen I go.

37.CN: 所爱隔山海，山海亦可平。

38.CN: 当陪你的人要下车时，即使再不舍也要心存感激笑着挥手告别。-宫崎骏
38.EN: When the person who comes with you is about to get off the car, even if you are reluctant, you should smile and wave goodbye with gratitude.

39.CN: 我不知道我是否真的爱你，但是我知道如果地球将要毁灭，你是我唯一想见的人。
39.EN: I don't know whether I really love you, but I know that if the earth is going to be destroyed, you are the only one I want to see.

40.CN: 我爱你，不是因为你是一个怎样的人，而是因为我喜欢与你在一起时的感觉。
40.EN: I love you not for who you are, but for who I am before you.

41.CN: 断开的绳子再怎么系也会有结，系的绳结越多，绳子自然也就会越短。
41.EN: No matter how many knots you tie, a broken rope will always be broken. The more knots you tie, the shorter the rope will be.

42.CN: 既然是100%讨厌你，那我就101%喜欢你。
42.EN: If I am to hate you 100%, then I like you 101%.

43.CN: “因为我刚好遇见你。” -李玉刚《刚好遇见你》
43.EN: Because I happened to meet you. - Li Yugang, Just Happened to Meet You

44.CN: 我们都在等一个已知的结局。
44.EN: We are all waiting for that same ending.

45.CN: 想要制造羁绊，就要承担掉眼泪的风险。
45.EN: If you want to create a bond, you have to be prepared to shed tears.

46.CN: “但彼此还是感觉到了对方的一个眼神，一个心跳。” -曲婉婷《我的歌声里》
46.EN: But we still felt each other's gaze, each other's heartbeat. - Qu Wanting, You Exist in My Song

47.EN: It's so silent, I miss you so much.

48.CN: 这个世上只有一种真正的英雄主义，那就是认清生活的真相，并且仍然热爱它。 -罗曼·罗兰
48.EN: There is only one true heroism in the world: to see the world as it is, and to love it. ― Roman Rolland

49.CN: 他们认为你做不到，你也觉得自己不行吗？
49.EN: Do you think you can't do it just because they think you can't?

50.CN: 永远太遥远，明天你还在就足够了。
50.EN: Forever is too far away, as long as you are here tomorrow, that's enough.

51.CN: 再问一次，朋友还是恋人？
51.EN: One last thing, be friends or lovers?

52.CN: 月亮不知道她的恬静皎洁，甚至不知道自己是月亮；沙砾不了解自己是沙砾。任何事物都不了解它独特的模样。-豪尔赫·路易斯·博尔赫斯《不可知》
52.EN: The moon doesn’t know how softly it shines. It doesn’t even know that it’s the moon; the sand, that it is sand.  We must assume that nothing understands its unique design. -Jorge Luis, Borges Of Which Nothing Is Known

53.CN: 如果你注定跟这个人没结果，而你又特别爱这个人，你要过程，还是结果，抑或是转身就走？
53.EN: If you are destined to have no future with someone, but you love them so much, do you want the process, or the result, or just turn around and leave?

54.CN: 如果一直不谈恋爱，真的会等到一个很好的人吗？
54.EN: If you never fall in love, will you really meet the one?

55.CN: 胆小鬼终究没等来缘分的眷顾。
55.EN: Cowards never get the favor of fate.

56.CN: 爱上没什么了不起，爱下去才了不起。
56.EN: It's nothing great to fall in love, but it's great to continue to love.

57.CN: 我见众生皆草木，唯有见你是青山。 愿有岁月可回首，且以你我共白头。
57.EN: I see all people as grass and trees, but you are the green mountain. I hope we can look back on the years and grow old together.

58.CN: 你静静地居住在我的心里，如同满月居于夜空。 -泰戈尔
58.EN: You will stay quiet in my heart, like the silent full-moon night. -Tagore

59.CN: 我们坐在岩石上看海，或许我们就会头顶岩石相爱。 -谷川俊太郎《二十忆光年的孤独》
59.EN: We sit on the rocks and watch the sea, and maybe the rocks will fall in love with each other. -Toshitara Takami

60.CN: 我这一生都是坚定的唯物主义者，唯有你，我希望有来生。 -周总理
60.EN: I have been a staunch materialist all my life, but I hope to have a next life with you. -Zhou Enlai

61.CN: 明月高悬于夜空，眼下是春天。我想起了你，内心是完整的。 -佩索阿《恋爱中的牧羊人》
61.EN: The bright moon hangs high in the night sky, and it's spring. I think of you, and my heart is complete. -Pessoa, The Shepherd in Love

62.CN: 龙应该藏在云里，你应该藏在心里。 -沈从文《月下小景》
62.EN: The dragon should hide in the clouds, and you should hide in my heart. -Shen Congwen, A Small Scene Under the Moon

63.CN: 情不知所起，一往而深。 -汤显祖《牡丹亭》
63.EN: Love knows no bounds, and it goes deeper and deeper. -Tang Xianzu, The Peony Pavilion
